title: Divyam Diamond Lakshmi Kasu Haaram with Emerald & Ruby Accents
materials: Cultured Pearls. Exquisite Hyderabadi Polish for lasting brilliance.
features: This stunning Haaram features a classic Kasu design with a contemporary twist. The entire necklace is embellished with meticulously set brilliant-cut diamonds, creating a dazzling effect. The Lakshmi motif at the center of the pendant is intricately crafted, evoking blessings and prosperity. The pendant's open setting adds a modern flair to the traditional design. Nakshi work accents enhance the intricate design. The emerald and ruby accents provide a vibrant contrast.
colors: Off-White/Cream (Pearls). A traditional South Indian color palette symbolizing prosperity and auspiciousness.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Also suitable for upscale formal events where you want to make a statement.
description: A harmonious blend of tradition and modern aesthetics. The Lakshmi motif is a symbol of wealth and prosperity, making this piece a cherished heirloom. The brilliant-cut diamonds provide exceptional sparkle and brilliance. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail by skilled artisans in Hyderabad. This Haaram is a testament to timeless elegance and exquisite craftsmanship.
